name: ProjectSEU
description: ProjectSEU (Project Shoot 'em up) Started life as an early college task which was then continuously improved upon for months. The current build includes, Local co-op ,with 1 player on Controller and 1 player on Keyboard & Mouse, allowing you to team up with a friend to set the highest score...   and that's basically it. More might be added in future but as it stands this was just a test project. Anyway, I hope you enjoy destroying and avoiding the deadly asteroids.
